Class LagrangianMechanics

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.physics.LagrangianMechanics
public class LagrangianMechanics extends Object
Lagrangian mechanics - analytical mechanics using generalized coordinates.

Based on Hamilton's principle of least action: Î´S = Î´âˆ«L dt = 0 Euler-Lagrange equation: d/dt(âˆ‚L/âˆ‚qÌ‡) - âˆ‚L/âˆ‚q = 0
